Bangladesh:
Jalaluddin Fateh Shah is assassinated by Habshi slaves.
Rule of the Habshi Sultans. (to 1494)
China:
The Chenghua Emperor died.
The Chenghua Emperor's son the Hongzhi Emperor became emperor of the Ming dynasty.
England: Battle of Stoke was the decisive engagement in an attempt by leading Yorkists to unseat Henry VII of England in favour of the pretender Lambert Simnel.
